explains: adj. 合法的，法律许可的；法定的
wordGroup: lawful right 合法权利；合法权益

sentences.en: The detention of the fugitive was lawful.
sentences.cn: 对逃亡者的拘留是合法的。

sentences.en: Lawful job search sites offer levels of privacy protection.
sentences.cn: 合法的求职网站提供一定程度的隐私保护。

sentences.en: However, he will not go until he receives the lawful signal.
sentences.cn: 然而，在收到合法的信号之前，他是不会走的。
